title: UPDATE 1-Apple supplier Skyworks to buy PMC-Sierra for $2 bln
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Yesterday 
Oct 5 (Reuters) - Apple supplier Skyworks Solutions Inc said it would buy chipmaker PMC-Sierra Inc for $2 billion in cash to expand its port...
